results.title: Cardiac Remodeling and Reversible Pulmonary Hypertension During Pneumonitis in Rats after 13-Gy Partial-Body Irradiation with Minimal Bone Marrow Sparing: Effect of Lisinopril.
results.text_hl: Irradiation without @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ demonstrated echocardiographic transient @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ by 50 d which was largely resolved by 100 d in survivors.

citations.NLM: Jacobs ER, Narayanan J, Fish BL, Gao F, Harmann LM, Bergom C, Gasperetti T, Strande JL, Medhora M. Cardiac Remodeling and Reversible Pulmonary Hypertension During Pneumonitis in Rats after 13-Gy Partial-Body Irradiation with Minimal Bone Marrow Sparing: Effect of Lisinopril. Health Phys. 2019 Apr;116(4):558-565. PMID: 30624347

results.title: [Pulmonary hypertension, endothelial dysfunction, and their correction with lisinopril in patients with heart failure in combination of ischemic heart disease and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease].
results.text_hl: [@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@Pulmonary hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and their correction with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ in combination of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@chronic obstructive pulmonary disease@@@].

citations.NLM: Pribylov SA. [Pulmonary hypertension, endothelial dysfunction, and their correction with lisinopril in patients with heart failure in combination of ischemic heart disease and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease]. Kardiologiia. 2006;46(9):36-40. PMID: 17047621

results.title: Ross-Konno procedure: a case study of a newborn.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Mitral_Valve_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D008944 @@@Mitral regurgitation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@ are being managed with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Puryear LD, Feliciano SM, Calhoon JH. Ross-Konno procedure: a case study of a newborn. Semin Perioper Nurs. 1995 Apr;4(2):124-31. PMID: 7780417
